short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays your IP address and location

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated on your public IP address and location. IP Address Finder is a simple and lightweight Chrome extension that shows you your IP and general location whenever you need it.

Main Features:

Quick IP Display: See your public IP as soon as you click the extension.
Location Info: Find out your country, region, and city based on your IP.
Easy-to-Use Design: A modern, clean look makes it easy to access your info.
Lightweight: It uses minimal resources, so it wonâ€™t slow down your browsing.
